features: Maximum Display Control: Drive up to six displays simultaneously with independent resolutions, refresh rates, color controls, and video overlays
Supports up to 6 monitors: With the ability to drive up to 6 displays simultaneously, you can have a more immersive and productive work environment on multiple screens.

Multiple connectivity options: The graphics card comes with multiple connectivity options, including 6x mini DisplayPorts and 6x HDMI adapters, so you can connect a variety of displays to meet your needs.
Efficient Design: The single slot, bus powered design is compatible with most systems with a 300W Power Supply and an available PCIe x16 slot
Robust construction: The graphics card is built with high-quality components and is designed to withstand the demands of continual usage and is backed by VisionTek's outstanding warranty and support
body.description: Dolby TrueHD and DTSHD Master AudioTM Support

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VisionTek Productivity Graphics Cards Graphics Cards Solutions VisionTek offers a range of graphics card solutions for an assortment of applications. Featuring the latest AMD Radeon Graphics Cards for productivity cards with multi-monitor support for business and professional applications. From simply upgrading the graphics quality of your workstation, to creating a powerhouse multi-display configuration, we have a large selection of Productivity Graphics Cards.

Digital Signage Restaurant owners, wow your customers with Digital Signage Menus. Easily update your offerings on your system and have them displayed beautifully on up to six screens in 4K brilliance. Let your live action menu entice customers! Productivity Expand your desktop with multiple displays allowing for better efficiency and improved multitasking capabilities. Have web browser windows, spreadsheets and email up and accessible at the same time. Corporate Showcase your business with a Digital Signage video wall. Individual display settings allow for complete flexibility in orientation and placement. Announce your VIP guests, keep employees informed, showcase your business with a multi display video card. Professional Stay up to date on trades and notifications. By installing one of our multi monitor graphics cards, you can expand your workspace, keeping all of your information in front of you and accessible. Success comes to those who are prepared. Digital Signage Productivity Corporate Professional
Improve Framerates, Higher Resolutions Expand Multiple Displays to Improve Multitasking Easy to Install Up to 3 Year Limited Protection Period

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing graphics card and works with linux.... I have 5 monitors attached and it rocks... I am going to get another monitor for 6 total monitors... so easy to install and graphics are great.!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This simply works. It was a little more expensive, but it simply worked well.
reviews.reviewText: It works. Right out of the box. I have a 10 screen setup and my gaming computer came with a great video card but it only runs 4 screens. I needed 10. So after some research, I decided to buy this one. No regrets. It is a little slower than my other video card, but its good enough for trading, so I am happy with the purchase. Works like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Irresponsible support Edited 6/3/23
reviews.reviewText: After months of trying to get this card to work support stopped responding to my emails. The card continuously crashed. I provided everything support asked for, I tried it in several different systems, driver versions recommended by AMD and the version recommended by support with no change. I sent the card in to be tested and they claimed to have tested it on two systems with no problems. It ran for one hour and crashed when I got it back. I finally installed a new card from a different vendor and have had no trouble at all. I'm convinced they didn't actually test it and between the time it took for shipping and receiving and the testing I was out the card for a month. I'll never buy anything from this company again and I suggest you don't either. Especially if you're providing service to clients and rely on vendor support. You will not get it.Edit: the manufacturer finally came through! For honesty's sake I have to say they shipped a new part and paid for the return of the old one. This was a one star review but I'll give them three now. If it hadn't taken so much time and effort to get the swapped part it would be a four.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Video keeps freezing
reviews.reviewText: Graphics card keeps freezing the video. The audio will work in the background, but the video just freezes for about 5 seconds. This happens about every 10 minutes.I've tried to get help from support but I just go round and round.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what you need for the job
reviews.reviewText: allowed my computer to split my 6 monitors. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little card for 4 monitors & Eyefinity use
reviews.reviewText: I use the card for my FSX flight sim and have four monitors...three across and one on top. When I use my regular screen resolutions, my primary screen is the center monitor. My three other screens can be used for moving tabs/windows around, etc.When I use the flight sim, I have an Eyefinity display group which makes my three across monitors into one giant monitor. My top monitor is used for moving lower resolution sim windows (like plane's GPS or autopilot) up there.Remember, you MUST use ACTIVE HDMI to Mini Display port adapters for the card to work with your monitors. I also have DVI's that are using adapters to the mini display ports on the card. Using non-active adapters won't work.I love this card. I'm not sure how it will work with the new 2020 flight sim, but I'm going to try it out before spending $600+ on a gaming card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are NOT mini-DV to HDMI connectors, they are mini-DV to DISPLAYPORT connectors
reviews.reviewText: The advertising is wrong or what they shipped was wrong, but since it was a sealed visiontek box I'm thinking the advertising was wrong. 2 of the 6 connectors were mini-displayport to DVI sockets, 4 were mini-displayport to displayport. Not one of them was mini-displayport to hdmi as advertised.

reviews.reviewerName: Really nice good place to get powder from
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Well had a hard time finding drivers
reviews.reviewText: But if you have a 300 wt power supply this works ok but find someone to help you find updated drivers for this it works better
